name: Demodesk
headline: AI-powered sales coaching
description: Demodesk provides AI-powered sales meeting software that summarizes your calls, automates CRM management, and delivers personalized, actionable sales coaching.

founders.name: Alex Popp, Founder
founders.description: Alex is co-founder and CTO of Demodesk, a sales coaching AI that summarizes your calls, automates CRM management, and delivers personalized, actionable call feedback. They raised >$10M from Y Combinator, Balderton, Kleiner Perkins, Target Global, GFC and renowned Silicon Valley angels. He studied Electrical Engineering at TUM & Stanford and Technology Management at CDTM.

founders.name: Veronika Wax, Founder
founders.description: Veronika is co-founder and CEO of Demodesk, a revolutionary online meeting platform with integrated real-time sales assistance. They raised $15M from Y Combinator, Balderton, Kleiner Perkins, Target Global, GFC and renowned angels from Silicon Valley. Before Demodesk, Veronika was a manager at Bain & Company and consulted Fortune 500 companies on their sales and investment strategy. She holds a Master in Business and Engineering from TU Munich and the Columbia University of New York.

## AI superpowers for sales meetings
AI that summarizes your calls, automates CRM management, and delivers personalized, actionable sales coaching. Never take notes again, improve your sales skills on every call, and gain critical go-to-market insights in seconds.
works with

AI Assistant
## Never take notes again
  * We **transcribe** your conversations in **98 languages** and condense them into **meaningful summaries** so you can focus on the conversation instead of taking notes
  * Automatically **sync call notes and next steps** to all the right places in your **CRM** to skip manual busywork
  * Let the AI Assistant generate **follow-up emails** ready to send to your customer so you can keep up deal momentum


[Learn more](https://demodesk.com/</solutions/ai-assistant>)
AI Coach
## Get better with every call
  * The Demodesk AI Coach provides **instant, personalized, and actionable feedback** after every sales call
  * **No setup required** – we leverage best-in-class AI combined with **insights from over 1 million sales calls** and frameworks from leading sales coaches
  * Use our **pre-built scorecards** that are based on **popular sales methodologies** (e.g. BANT, MEDDIC, SPICED) or create your own to reflect your unique processes


[Learn more](https://demodesk.com/</solutions/ai-coach>)
![Sales coaching](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661a2e3235ecccd2ab45b841_greatjob.avif)
![Meeting analytics](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661a30ab5f85c8b219ff0676_graph.avif)
AI Insights
## Gain critical insights in seconds
  * Get an **X-Ray view of meetings** with a **single, searchable recording library** and all **conversation statistics and metrics** in one place
  * Demodesk analyzes your conversations, **identifies areas for improvement** and **provides insights** that make a difference (e.g., what top performers do differently, which objections come up in calls)
  * Understand **team performance, track improvement** over time and **identify trends** across all interactions


[Learn more](https://demodesk.com/</solutions/ai-insights>)
## No set-up effort & highest security standards
![No process change](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab56aed163eab8fe76b13_no-process-change.svg)
### No process change
Demodesk handles calls without any setup. You connect your calendar to Demodesk and everything else happens in the background.
![set up in 30sec](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab5850e5f306f0bba8a7f_set-up-in-30sec.svg)
### Set up in 10 seconds
Sign up in 10 seconds using your Google or Microsoft login. The Demodesk Notetaker automatically joins your meetings and does the magic.
![Designed by the best in sales](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab659ca5426d279b43d39_designed-by-the-best-sales.svg)
### Designed by the best in sales
We’ve analyzed over 1 million sales calls and worked with the best sales coaches in the world to develop our AI models. 
![GDPR complaint](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab6718bda4a590ae5a188_gdpr-complaint.svg)
### GDPR compliant
Demodesk is built and hosted in secure data centers. Fully compliant with GDPR and all other data privacy and compliance regulations.
![Works across platforms](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab6890872119944acae80_works-across.svg)
### Works across platforms
Demodesk integrates natively with all major calendar, CRM, meeting, engagement and dialing systems, and offers flexible API integration.
![Secure & Private](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6048e45faa378d2a5d047448/661ab6a51ef0918a1c0bff72_secure-private.svg)
### Secure & Private
Demodesk prioritizes security. We encrypt recordings, both at rest and in transit, along with authorization, log monitoring and comprehensive security protocols.
## Businesses of all sizes rely on us to digitalize sales, boost productivity and drive more revenue
### 2x higher
conversion rates
### 3x increase
in agent productivity
### + 30% higher
revenue per seller
### +50% faster
lead response time
### +50% faster
new hire ramp time
### +25% time
saved on manual tasks

AI Assistant
## Never take notes again
  * We **transcribe** your conversations in **98 languages** and condense them into **meaningful summaries** so you can focus on the conversation instead of taking notes
  * Automatically **sync call notes and next steps** to all the right places in your **CRM** to skip manual busywork
  * Let the AI Assistant generate **follow-up emails** ready to send to your customer so you can keep up deal momentum


Learn more⟨41⟩
AI Coach
## Get better with every call
  * The Demodesk AI Coach provides **instant, personalized, and actionable feedback** after every sales call
  * **No setup required** – we leverage best-in-class AI combined with **insights from over 1 million sales calls** and frameworks from leading sales coaches
  * Use our **pre-built scorecards** that are based on **popular sales methodologies** (e.g. BANT, MEDDIC, SPICED) or create your own to reflect your unique processes


Learn more⟨42⟩
![Sales coaching⟨43⟩]
![Meeting analytics⟨44⟩]
AI Insights
## Gain critical insights in seconds
  * Get an **X-Ray view of meetings** with a **single, searchable recording library** and all **conversation statistics and metrics** in one place
  * Demodesk analyzes your conversations, **identifies areas for improvement** and **provides insights** that make a difference (e.g., what top performers do differently, which objections come up in calls)
  * Understand **team performance, track improvement** over time and **identify trends** across all interactions


Learn more⟨45⟩
## No set-up effort & highest security standards
![No process change⟨46⟩]
### No process change
Demodesk handles calls without any setup. You connect your calendar to Demodesk and everything else happens in the background.
![set up in 30sec⟨47⟩]
### Set up in 10 seconds
Sign up in 10 seconds using your Google or Microsoft login. The Demodesk Notetaker automatically joins your meetings and does the magic.
![Designed by the best in sales⟨48⟩]
### Designed by the best in sales
We’ve analyzed over 1 million sales calls and worked with the best sales coaches in the world to develop our AI models. 
![GDPR complaint⟨49⟩]
### GDPR compliant
Demodesk is built and hosted in secure data centers. Fully compliant with GDPR and all other data privacy and compliance regulations.
![Works across platforms⟨50⟩]
### Works across platforms
Demodesk integrates natively with all major calendar, CRM, meeting, engagement and dialing systems, and offers flexible API integration.
![Secure & Private⟨51⟩]
### Secure & Private
Demodesk prioritizes security. We encrypt recordings, both at rest and in transit, along with authorization, log monitoring and comprehensive security protocols.

generated_description:
### Demodesk: AI-Powered Sales Coaching

**Founded:** 2018  
**Location:** Munich, Germany  
**Team Size:** 25 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W19  
**Website:** [demodesk.com](https://demodesk.com)

---

Demodesk is at the forefront of utilizing AI to enhance sales processes. Initially, they focused on creating AI-powered sales meeting software, but their mission has expanded to delivering comprehensive AI-driven sales coaching. Their tools not only summarize calls and automate CRM management, but they also offer personalized and actionable insights to improve sales performance.

### Key Offerings:

1. **AI Assistant:** Never take notes again. Demodesk automatically transcribes conversations in 98 languages, syncs call details to CRM, and generates follow-up emails. This allows sales professionals to concentrate on what really matters—engaging with their clients.

2. **AI Coach:** Instant feedback is now at your fingertips. The AI Coach analyzes calls and provides personalized coaching based on insights from over a million sales conversations. It’s designed to help sales teams improve with every interaction.

3. **AI Insights:** Gain critical insights into your sales meetings. Demodesk offers a searchable recording library that captures conversation metrics and statistics, helping teams identify patterns and areas for improvement.

### Users and Impact:

With fewer manual tasks and enhanced productivity, Demodesk’s platform is designed for all types of businesses looking to transform their sales process. They boast impressive metrics, showing that users can achieve:
- 2x higher conversion rates
- 3x increase in agent productivity
- 30% higher revenue per seller

### Integration and Security:

Demodesk integrates seamlessly with major calendar and CRM systems, ensuring a smooth workflow without requiring disruptive changes. Plus, having a strong focus on safety, the platform is compliant with GDPR, and it employs robust encryption to guarantee data security.

### Conclusion:

If you're looking to elevate your sales strategies through technology, Demodesk makes a compelling case. Their approach marries the need for efficiency with cutting-edge AI capabilities, helping sales teams become more effective while saving time. 

For further exploration or to get started, check out [demodesk.com](https://demodesk.com) and see how AI can revolutionize your sales efforts!
